name: Wukong Black Legend
summary: Face the unknown, fight with courage, and uncover hidden secrets.

name: Wuthering Waves: Fiery Arpeggio of Summer Reunion
summary:
Version 2.3 of Wuthering Waves, including:
• New characters: Zani and Ciaccona
• New story quests
• First anniversary celebrations
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Wuthering Waves: All Silent Souls Can Sing
summary:
Version 2.0 of Wuthering Waves is the game's first major post-release update, and it includes:
• New characters: Carlotta and Roccia
• New region: Rinascita, with several new areas
• New story quests: Prologue - Through the Sea Thou Break
• New exploration systems
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Wuthering Waves: Unfading Melody of Life
summary:
Version 2.5 of Wuthering Waves, including:
• New characters: Phrolova
• New area: Fabricatorium of the Deep
• New story quests
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Wu-Tang: Rise of the Deceiver
summary: Wu-Tang: Rise of the Deceiver is a co-op action RPG with anime-style fighting and afro-surrealist aesthetic. Players will face increasingly challenging battle Chambers to the tune of reimagined Wu-Tang Clan tracks while decking out their own custom fighters.

name: Wurm Unlimited
summary:
Wurm Unlimited is the standalone version of the fantasy sandbox world Wurm Online, the MMORPG where the players are in charge! 
A pioneer in the ideas of player influence, crafting and adventure, it is now one of the most deep and feature packed true sandbox experiences available.

name: Wulin Chess
summary: This is an oriental fantasy game of turn-based strategy. On the basis of the traditional turn-based strategy game, it incorporates a more rational growth model, stronger role mechanisms, deeper strategic caps, and rich collection of growth elements.

name: Wuthering Waves: Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides
summary:
Version 2.7 of Wuthering Waves, including:
• New characters: Galbrena and Qiuyuan
• New story quests
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Wu Xing Chess
summary: A game that requires the intelligence of multiple players (2-4).Adapted from the traditional Five Elements gameplay and the traditional Chinese Five Elements elements.Each player will be assigned a type of attribute, striving to connect their attributes into a line of 5.

name: Wuz up b? Produce: Street Dancer
summary:
Street Dancer is a rhythm game starring the crew of wuz↑b? a Japanese pop music performance group.

The game features standard with a line of button prompts scrolling across the bottom of the play are that you will have to press when they reach the center of the screen. Before you start a game you will be asked to select a member of the wuz↑b? crew; Nana, Kaoru, Shino, or U. As you press buttons the chosen terpsichorean will shake it or stare at you in stupefaction, depending on your performance. A 'life bar' is presented on the screen if you fail to perform well the bar will go down, when it is empty your game ends. To clear a stage and unlock a new background with a harder song you'll have to get about a 60% perfect score. You can always record your performances to watch over and over.

name: Wukong Fight in Kaoria
summary: This is a single player action adventure game that includes mythological themed character actions and role-playing, You can use regular attacks and skills, spells, such as magic, celestial phenomena, and body fixing spells, to Fight and defeat the enemies you encounter.

name: Wuthering Waves: Thaw of Eons
summary:
Version 1.1 of Wuthering Waves, which included:
• New characters: Jinhsi and Changli
• New location: Mt. Firmament
• New companion story for Changli (Immortal Blaze)
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Wubbzy's Amazing Adventure
summary: Wubbzy's Amazing Adventure is an Adobe Flash web-game based around the TV series Wow Wow Wubbzy released in 2006 on the official Nick Jr website.

name: Wuthering Waves: Tangled Truth in Inverted Tower
summary:
Version 2.2 of Wuthering Waves, including:
• New characters: Cantarella and Rover (Aero)
• New areas: Avinoleum and Beohr Waters
• New story quests
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Wuthering Waves: To the City Set in Amber
summary:
Version 2.8 of Wuthering Waves, including:
• New characters: Chisa and Buling
• New story quests
• New area: Chronorift Metropolis
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Wuthering Waves: By Sun's Scourge, By Moon's Revelation
summary:
Version 2.6 of Wuthering Waves, including:
• New characters: Augusta and Iuno
• New area: Sanguis Plateau
• New story quests
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Wufo
summary: Navigate your ship and recover Wi-Fi while dodging obstacles and fighting space enemies in the 4 worlds and 8 available bosses. You can also play together with a friend in 2D cooperative multiplayer!

name: Wumbrik
summary: Use the colored blocks to create bigger colored blocks in Wumbrik

name: Wuli Sandbox
summary: In this physics-based particle sandbox, everything is in flux: water, steam, ice, magma, acid... Blast it. Wreck it. Build it!

name: Wukong Sun: Black Legend
summary:
Unleash the Legend of the Monkey King!
Battle through chaos, conquer mythical foes, and reclaim your destiny.

name: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers
summary: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers is a soulslike action RPG set in the land of Shu during the dark and tumultuous late Ming Dynasty, plagued by warring factions and a mysterious illness that spawns monstrous creatures.

name: Wukong 2088
summary: Wukong 2088 is a survival rogue-like game where you play as the secret weapon of Sun Wukong in futuristic Journey to the West. You will resist the invasion of the Cyber TianGong, face endless waves of enemies and bosses, defeat them, and strengthen yourself to fight against the powerful Mega-Corp.

name: Wuppo: Breft Festival Forever
summary: Mess up or clean the bizarre world of Wuppo: Breft Festival (Forever) in this action packed 3v3 online platformer shooter. Go make friends, gain rivals and become a BFF legend!

name: Wunderdoktor
summary: Step into the role of the Wunderdoktor, a traveling doctor whose daily work is to cure rare and exotic diseases. Explore a world full of quackery, ghosts and addictive potions.

name: Wuthering Waves: We Who See the Stars
summary:
Version 3.0 of Wuthering Waves is the game's second major post-release update, and it includes:
• New characters: Lynae and Mornye
• New region: Lahai-Roi, with several new areas
• New story quests
• New exploration systems
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Wuppo
summary: Enter the wondrous world of Wuppo! Fight numerous enemies, collect countless items, and solve immersive puzzles, all while exploring the detailed history of the world in your quest to find a new home.

name: WuKong Up
summary: 《Wukong UP》 is a 3D parkour game featuring the Chinese mythological character "Wukong" as the main character. Sun Wukong caused a great disturbance in the Heavenly Palace and was later suppressed by the Tathagata under the Mountain. The player will control Wukong's Clone to rescue himself.

name: Wushu Chronicles 2
summary: Wushu Chronicles 2 is a martial arts sandbox ARPG game. It is the orthodox sequel to Wushu Chronicles, using the latest self-developed engine flexi3.0, the picture effect is greatly improved. The game uses a seamless big map exploration mechanism, and you can write your arena freely.

name: Wummsen Village
summary:
Wummsen Village is a fast-paced party game for up to 4 players.
Choose your favorite mode, jump into the ring, and start throwing punches!
Combat follows a unique revolver-style system: press the attack button three times in a row to perform three distinct moves. This makes it easy for newcomers to get started, while giving seasoned players the depth to master timing, combos, and high-damage plays.

Whether you’re in it for friendly chaos or competitive glory, Wummsen delivers laughs, action, and unforgettable party moments.

name: Wuthering Waves: Lightly We Toss the Crown
summary:
Version 2.4 of Wuthering Waves, including:
• New characters: Cartethyia and Lupa
• New areas: Septimont
• New story quests
• New outfits for Chagnli and Carlotta
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Wumball
summary: Wumball is a challenging adventure game. You have no health and no weapons to defend yourself, so tread lightly. Can you make it to the end and save the king?

name: Wurm: Journey to the Center of the Earth!
summary: Wurm: Journey to the Center of the Earth is a game featuring multiple sequences. The player controls the VZR vehicle, and occasionally Captain Moby when she ventures out on foot in vertically and horizontally scrolling sequences as well as a first person battle against enemy monsters. Players progress through 5 levels, in which the VZR-5 investigates the fate of the other VZRs. After the completion of each level, the player gains a crystal, which will unlock additional weapons for the VZR, mentioned below.

name: Wukong Monkey King's Journey West
summary: Quirky Journey to the West: Wukong has learned more skills—capture balls, rocket launchers, and dark magic to subdue demons. If the teachings don't resonate, I also know a bit of hand-to-hand combat.

name: Wuppo: Definitive Edition
summary: After losing its home, one lonely Wum must travel the length and width of the world to find a new place to live. From the metropolitan haven Popocity to the cavernous Bliekopolis, our Wum will discover magical places and encounter strange creatures. But this Wum is no traditional hero and only by using wit and charm can it succeed in this massive journey.

name: Wuxia Master
summary: Wuxia Master is a relaxed SLG game, which focused on character development, thought-provoking story plotline, and smooth fighting. As new valiant warrior, players will prepare for the World’s Wuxia contest held by the royal court to win the glorious title of Wuxia Master.

name: Wunderling
summary:
Take control of the Wunderling, a low-level video game goon who has just unlocked the power to jump.

Unable to stop or change direction at will, you will need to plan ahead and master the Wunderlings’ abilities to navigate treacherous scrolling levels and chase down that pesky Hero...

name: Wukong
summary:
A small and colorful platformer, inspired by the "Journey to the West" novel. Every level contains a new mechanic that will explore new ways to use your skills.
In Wukong you play as the Monkey Key in a quest to retrieve the lost scrolls. Jump, spin, throw your staff, and step on the enemies that will try to put an end to your journey.

name: Wu Confucian Painting Volume: Apocalypse
summary: Wu Confucian Painting Volume-Apocalypse" is a three-country background development game. Players can formulate their own development routes in the game, or assist the emperor as a counselor, or assist the emperor to seek the Quartet as a military commander, and he can be the monarch himself

name: Wurm Online
summary:
Wurm Online is a totally unique, highly accessible online wilderness MMORPG that will drag you in, shake you up and down, bite you, annoy you, drive you completely mad and leave you wondering why you didn’t find it a million years ago!

Both PvP and PvE server clusters are available. On the Freedom PvE cluster, you can enjoy a peaceful life being eaten by bears in the woods. One of those servers offers opportunities to get a taste for fighting with other players, though. The Epic PvP cluster offers a lot of opportunities to fight and compete with other players. It also has bears, so watch out! You can transfer your account between the clusters at any time, skills and items do not transfer but are kept intact.

Playing is easy. Just register for free and then download the Java client and packages by clicking on the Play! button on the site. Oh, you need Java, but there is a handy link for Java up to the right. Java is, of course, platform-independent, which means you can play Wurm on Linux, Mac, and even Windows!

name: Wurroom
summary: Wurroom is an interactive art experience, disguised as an exploration adventure game, relieved through the story of a Hand, lost in unknown worlds and unclaimed realities. Also, the game is free!

name: Wuthering Waves
summary:
Wuthering Waves is a story-rich open-world action RPG. You wake from your slumber as Rover, joined by a vibrant cast of Resonators on a journey to reclaim your lost memories and surmount the Lament.

The game features fast-paced combat with a variety of mechanics such as Extreme Evasion and Dodge Counter. You can also absorb the remaining of the monsters you've defeated and use their power in battles.

name: Wuxia archive: Crisis escape
summary: Wuxia archive: Crisis escape is a text adventure puzzle game. The player will play a knight who is trapped in an unknown dungeon, get clues with other trapped characters, use the props in the scene to solve the puzzle and get out of danger.

name: Wulverblade
summary: Wulverblade puts you in the role of Britons' greatest warriors as you resist the oppressive expansion of the Roman Legions and the traitorous allied tribes.

name: Wuxian
summary: This is an independent game! It has a unique way of playing. I hope you can enjoy it! It's definitely worth it!

name: Wumpus
summary: A mobile remake of the PC original

name: Wurst Defender Coop Edition
summary: Type words, squashing ants in the process, protecting your precious Wurst (sausage). Play in single- or local multiplayer and even create your own word packs for even more fun in the game.

name: Wudao
summary: Wudao is a story game that revolves around the real life experiences of Mr. Wang Yangming. At that time, you will play the role of a scholar who pursues the true essence of psychology.

name: Wuz
summary: Short, single player, humorous text adventure game. Claimed to be one of the first works of erotic interactive fiction, as well as one of the first games to allow the player to choose their sex and sexual orientation, with different paths depending on those choices.

name: Wunderheilung
summary:
Wunderheilung is a game about helping people. 
 
It's also about burning cigarettes at extreme heat and looking beneath the surface of serious medical conditions. 
 
In Wunderheilung, things are not what they appear to be.

name: Wurdweb
summary: Grab words from a list and cross them with words on the board. Puzzle your way towards a Finish Tile, put down enough words, or put down as many words as you can!

name: Wuhu Island Explorer
summary: Roam around freely in Wuhu Island without any restrictions.

name: Wuhan Clan
summary: Wuhan Clan is a retro inspired pixel art platformer with a modern twist!

name: Wulin Zheng Ba Zhi Yingxiong Tie
Wukong's Child: Monkey King Myth
summary: Embark on an epic journey as Wukong's child. Face mythical creatures, solve ancient puzzles, and uncover the secrets of the Monkey King. Are you ready for the adventure of a lifetime?

name: Wunderhaven
summary: Welcome to Wunderhaven. You're the lone surviving descendant of a not-so-legendary line of peasants. You've been summoned to a failing kingdom in the hopes that your hard work can spur a new wave of wealth and prosperity. Will you replenish the coffers and save the kingdom?

name: Wunderling: Kohlrabi's Ruin
summary: The Wunderling universe expands with one new world, new fabulous items and a stunning conclusion to the saga!

name: Wulin Qunxia Zhuan
summary: A Chinese role-playing game, released for the PC in 2001.

name: Wukong Odyssey
summary: Wukong Odyssey is an epic adventure game with a classic platformer-style gameplay that will keep you entertained for hours. As the fearless hero, Sun Wukong, you'll embark on an incredible journey through a magical world filled with danger and excitement.

name: Wulfram II
summary: Wulfram II was a team based, multiplayer only, hybrid first person shooter and real-time strategy game featuring hovertanks that battle to wipe the opposing team off of a large 3-Dimensional map.

name: Wuru Painting Scroll: Romance of Heaven and Earth
summary: Wuru Painting Scroll - Romance of Heaven and Earth is a development game with a mythological background. Players can formulate their own development routes in the game, or defend their homeland and the country, fight in all directions, or seek wisdom and courage.

name: Wurd Torn
summary: A word game from Michel de Messieres.

name: Wushu Chronicles
summary: 《武林志》是一款由蜗牛游戏旗下江湖工作室所制作的一款PC角色扮演类单机游戏。采用的是蜗牛自研引擎Flexi。玩家将可以在大明武林中随心所欲的成长、探索。

name: Wulfram
summary: An early attempt at an (internet-based) multiplayer-only 3D strategy game developed by developer Bolt-Action.

name: Wurzelimperium
summary: Play the browser game Wurzelimperium now for free. Trade with other players and create your garden paradise online in this browser game.

name: Wu Shi Hun
Wurzelnsisters
summary: Cute Shooting Game: Drive Away the Goblins Attacking the Town with Modern Firearms!

name: Wu-Tang: Shaolin Style
summary:
Master the art of Wu-Tang

Battle in up to four-player martial arts brawls. Master the attacks and weapons of each of nine Wu-Tang. Collect 30 chambers and eliminate your opponent in over 50 masterful cinematic fatality sequences.

Featuring RZA, Method Man, Raekwon, GZA, Ol' Dirty BAstard, Masta Killa, U-God, Inspectah Deck, Ghostface Killah

name: Wunderwaffe
summary: Wunderwaffe - a game of tanks with a view from above. There are three game modes (team battle for killing, each for himself for killing, capturing a flag) in this game. Also the game is on the same computer.

name: Wuscar
summary: Wuscar is a thrilling FPS Multiplayer experience. Collect weapons, Upgrade your Robotic limbs and become the strongest Wuscar known to man.

name: Wurds
summary:
Wurds is a unique, varied and hugely enjoyable word puzzle game.
Not only are there literally hundreds of millions of unique FREE puzzles that you can play as much as you like. You can also create and share your own games for a truly endless experience.
Create enough words to fill the board from the letter tiles you are given before running out of time to advance through the levels and up the leaderboards. Play without time limits in laid-back mode or create a globe of words in word matrix games.
Each level is generated dynamically, so there are an almost limitless amount of levels to play. The words you have to find are not predefined either, so as long as you enter a real word that fits on the game board, you can play it.
Create your own custom games by defining a set of letters and words to find. Add a time limit, or not, and share it for any of your Wurds friends to play.
Optional, plural and singular word checking and automatic entry. Say goodbye to the tedious process of entering slightly altered words over and over again.
You can play the standard game, free forever. You never have to buy anything.

name: Wuilsafe
summary: Wuilsafe is adventure game about exploration. Expand your world, explore a bunch of interesting mechanics. Play comfortably. Play the way you like. Play with blocks.

name: Wurmus
summary: Endless snake-like game of tag

name: Wubbzy's Bilingual Treehouse Laptop
summary: Wubbzy's Bilingual Treehouse Laptop is an educational laptop LCD game based on the Wow! Wow! Wubbzy series developed and released by WinFun in 2009.

name: Wunderling DX
summary: Dash, jump, and fly at full speed through Wunderling DX: a non-stop puzzle platformer and the world's first "goomba simulator"! Race against the clock, beat tricky puzzles to uncover shiny secrets, and stomp the odds to please your evil overlord!

name: Wuxia: Founding Schools
summary: "Wuxia: Founding Schools" is a Chinese-style martial arts card game. Players can create sects, train heroes, build decks, and create unique cards and styles using different effects. It's all about drawing and playing cards!

name: Wuxia World
Wuthering Waves: When the Night Knocks
summary:
Version 1.4 of Wuthering Waves, which included:
• New characters: Camellya and Lumi
• New main event: Somnium Labyrinth
• New companion story for Camellya: Forking Path Among the Stars
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Wuthering Waves: To the Shore's End
summary:
Version 1.3 of Wuthering Waves, which included:
• New characters: Shorekeeper and Youhu
• New main story quest: Chapter 1 Act 8
• New companion story for Encore: Small Wooly, Big Adventures
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Wuthering Waves: In the Turquoise Moonglow
summary:
Version 1.2 of Wuthering Waves, which included:
• New characters: Zhezhi and Xiangli Yao
• New main event: By Moon's Grace
• New companion story for Zhezhi: True Colors
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Wukong's Pool
summary: Wukong's Pool is a unique fusion of roguelike elements, poker strategy, and the gameplay of billiards. In this pool game, you take on the role of Wukong, the Monkey King, facing a series of challenges.

name: Wuthering Waves: Waves Sing, and the Cerulean Bird Calls
summary:
Version 2.1 of Wuthering Waves, including:
• New characters: Phoebe and Brant
• New areas: Riccioli Islands and Vault Underground
• New story quests
• New endgame content: Whimpering Wastes
• New echoes, events and more!

name: WuJiDaoRen
summary: WuJiDaoRen is a physics-based fighting game, that can put you back into the classic Kung Fu films. Play as a mighty hero to challenge the most dangerous villains in the world and bring peace to the people.

name: Wub-Wub Wescue
summary:
A pug must brave the jungle and navigate its treacherous rhythms, all to rescue his master. An early 80’s arcade platformer.

Game available on Retro Game Crunch.

name: Wuxing Master(CCG)
summary: “Wuxing Master” is a multiplayer online Collectible Card Game(CCG) which is based on Chinese traditional myths. Its rules and numerical value have been honed for ten years. Now the game is available for Windows, Android and iOS, on each of which can you share the data.
